body.p:
Henderson Ky. Decr 18th 1863.
To
His Excellency Govr Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Enclosed find Petition of John Tuell of Henderson, together with endorsation of the Jury who tried the cause, and recommendation of Hon W P. Fowler &c.
Mr Tuell is a good citizen, but poor in the "worlds goods". The payment of the fine of $40 would oppress him greviously
He hopes that your Excellency will afford him the relief asked.

Very Respectfully
Robt Glass
Atto for Tuell
